description: A React functional component named EmptyState that displays a message and a button when there are no notes in the application.

methods.name: EmptyState({ onCreate })
methods.description: A React functional component that rendering a message and a button prompting the user to create a new note.
methods.onCreate: A prop function called when the 'Create a Note' button is clicked, provided externally.
methods.render: Returns JSX displaying 'No notes yet' message with a button.
